meaning_str.bing:
adj. 残酷的；冷酷的；残忍的；残暴的
adv. 非常
网络. 无情的；令人痛苦的

残酷的；冷酷的；残忍的；残暴的

残酷的；无情的；冷酷的；残忍的；残暴的；引起痛苦的；不人道的；刻薄的；（规则等）严格的；严峻的；令人极痛苦的；刻毒伤人的

1.en: Thank god your dear mother did not live to see the cruel, miserable death of her youngest child!
1.cn: 感谢上帝，你的母亲并没有看到她最小的儿子如此悲惨的死去。

2.en: A score of men, for this was the very thickest of the ambush, joined in this cruel and untimely mirth.
2.cn: 有二十个人--因为这儿是埋伏人数最多的一处--参加了这个残忍的不合时宜的作乐活动。

3.en: It sometimes seems as if God played a cruel trick on humanity by putting so much of a precious resource in such rough places.
3.cn: 这像是上帝和人类开了一个残酷的玩笑，将如此宝贵的石油资源放置到这样一个贫瘠的地区。

0.en: So this is how it ends with cruel irony.
0.cn: 于是乎就此了结，真是无比残酷的讽刺。

1.en: But I am a proud Mongol. At times, peace can only be achieved through cruel war.
1.cn: 但是我是个自豪的蒙古人，有时只有通过残酷的战争才能实现和平。

3.en: Look, you said a lot of things to me, Kevin. I mean, you told me I was cruel. But worse than cruel inauthentic. But you were right.
3.cn: 你对我说了很多，凯文。你说我无情，但比无情更糟。我活得不真实，不过你说得对。

4.en: Cruel as that may be, but this is not in itself a credential.
4.cn: 这么叫你或许很残忍，但并不能证明什么。

5.en: In short, any one who told you that you would someday be able to make any significant contribution to physics, played a cruel trick on you, a cruel trick indeed.
5.cn: 简单来说如果谁告诉你们你们有朝一日能在物理学上有所建树，那完全是个残忍的笑话，太残忍了。

6.en: How cruel. So now I'm a poor foot-soldier. Too lowly even to be noticed.
6.cn: 多么残酷啊。所以到现在我还是名一贫如洗的士兵，低微的以至于引不起任何人的注意。

7.en: The fever. The rage. The feeling of powerlessness. It turns good men cruel.
7.cn: 怒火，狂暴，无力的感觉，能让好人变得残酷。

8.en: Yes, we all know how cruel parents can be about the flatness of a child's pillow.
8.cn: 我们都知道父母对枕头平的孩子有多凶。

9.en: No! What? Why? Why are you so cruel? I don't understand it. I've tried to be kind to you.
9.cn: 不！天？为什么？为什么你这样冷酷？我不明白。我试着善待你。

10.en: For I have sprung you from life's cruel dungeon, and hereby grant you liberty. Suffer no more.
10.cn: 因为我已经把你们从那个地牢里救了出来，给你们自由了！你们的痛苦结束了。

11.en: Harold, this is chloral hydrate. I'm going to put you out. Making you watch would just be cruel.
11.cn: 哈罗德，这是水合氯醛[镇静剂]，我要先把你放倒，让你亲眼见证，未必太残忍了。

12.en: Oh, tweets about my lecture. That's rather unfair. That's downright cruel. Plus, insects have six legs.
12.cn: 关于我的课的微薄啊，这条很不公平，这条太伤人了，而且，昆虫都有六条腿。

13.en: You are so cruel, did you won't allow a daughter to say her father goodbye? Forever can spare a minute.
13.cn: 你就这么铁石心肠，都不让我跟爸爸道个别吗？你可是要关他一辈子啊。

14.en: Who put the sticks up their butts? What? No, that's just a... That is cruel. It's just a phrase people use.
14.cn: 谁顶住屁股？不，那只是… 好残忍。只是个说法。

15.en: Because they are being held captive by the only person cruel enough to keep them locked up all these years.
15.cn: 因为他们都被抓走了，只有一个人会残忍的关他们这么多年。

16.en: This act of aggression must be met with swift and cruel ferocity. It is time to cry havoc, and let slip the dogs of war.
16.cn: 这种野蛮行径必须以牙还牙，以血还血，大声疾呼的时刻到了，让我们释放战争恶魔吧。

17.en: Well, no. When I get to the point where, you know, I'm ready to hear cruel, mocking jokes about Mike, I'm gonna come to you.
17.cn: 不，当我准备好要听糗死的麦克笑话时，我会来找你的。
